name: Diagram: Finale of the Deep
desc: A blueprint drawn by Estelle based on ancient legends and records. Learn it and you can restore Finale of the Deep (Sword).

value.text: Learn to forge Finale of the Deep.
Purchase from Estelle at Beaumont Workshop in Court of Fontaine

value.name: Finale of the Deep
value.desc: This longsword is as silent as the mysterious ocean depths. It is even more ancient than its stylings might imply.

customize.name: Estelle
customize.desc: The owner of Beaumont Workshop. After working at the Fontaine Research Institute as a renowned scientist, she now uses her skills to develop advanced Fontainian machinery to aid her forging as a blacksmith.

customize.name: Bulle Fruit
customize.desc: A fruit that grows in warm and damp environments with ample sunlight. Inside this round and rotund fruit hides a sweet and refreshing surprise.

customize.name: Tidalga
customize.desc: An algae floating with the tides that sustains itself by feeding on substances produced by other plants. Though often mistaken for zooplankton, based on its nature, Tidalga is actually a type of phytoplankton.

customize.name: Condessence Crystal
customize.desc: A bright and clear crystal with a core that is both tough and malleable.

customize.name: Finale of the Deep
customize.desc: This longsword is as silent as the mysterious ocean depths. It is even more ancient than its stylings might imply.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Midlander Sword Billet
customize.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star swords.

Philosophers believe that there are four purposes behind earthly things. The purpose of these billets is to become a weapon worthy of accompanying a hero.

customize.name: Condessence Crystal
customize.desc: A bright and clear crystal with a core that is both tough and malleable.

customize.name: White Iron Chunk
customize.desc: Skilled hands can make this into something brilliant.

customize.name: Diagram: Tidal Shadow
customize.desc: A blueprint drawn by Estelle based on ancient legends and records. Learn it and you can restore Tidal Shadow (Claymore).

customize.name: Diagram: Rightful Reward
customize.desc: A blueprint drawn by Estelle based on ancient legends and records. Learn it and you can restore Rightful Reward (Polearm).

customize.name: Diagram: Flowing Purity
customize.desc: A blueprint drawn by Estelle based on ancient legends and records. Learn it and you can restore Flowing Purity (Catalyst).

customize.name: Diagram: Song of Stillness
customize.desc: A blueprint drawn by Estelle based on ancient legends and records. Learn it and you can restore Song of Stillness (Bow).
